comments.creator: jjoejimmy@gmail.com
comments.author: jjoejimmy@gmail.com
comments.raw_text:
Steps to Reproduce
---------------------------------------
1. goto http://www.mozilla.org/en-US/thunderbird/
2. the free download button is missing
3. the link is also incorrect
4. i am running the newest nightly build (9.0.a.1

What should have happened:
---------------------------------------
there should have been a green "free download" button for mozilla thunderbird and if you click it, there is an automatic download

What actually happened:
----------------------------------------
there should have been a green "free download" button, but there was only a link. Also, if you press on the link, it brings you to another page instead of the downloading page

What actually happened:
----------------------------------------
there should have been a green "free download" button, but there was only a link. Also, if you press on the link, it brings you to another page instead of the downloading page
